name: PEKONG
description: PEKONG is a community-driven meme token on Solana that blends crypto culture, humor, and entertainment. Featuring Pekong, a golden god and rapper-style mascot, the project aims to unite global communities through memes, creative utilities, and events. Beyond just being a meme, PEKONG is building an ecosystem of meme generators, mini-games, NFTs, and animated content to create lasting value and fun for holders.
